description:
Part A: Ochiiri has a great home and loving wife. He lives a life that everyone would be envious of, but he had a problem that he couldn’t mention to anyone. One day, he happens to encounter Moguro in a dark alleyway and ends up telling him his secret that he couldn’t even tell his wife.
 
Part B: Mamano Ari works hard to make her daughter’s dream of becoming a top idol come true. Ari had no doubts that her daughter would succeed. Ari encounters Moguro one day and he warns her about something, but she doesn’t listen. However, she receives shocking news from her daughter...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pulsions autodestructrices – Je suis une idole
Selbstzerstörerisches Verhalten / Ich bin ein Idol
破滅症患者 / 私はアイドル
